input.command: cd /home/user/project && pkill -f node && pkill -f next && sleep 2 && lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo "Port cleared" && npm run dev > server.log 2>&1 & sleep 4
input.description: Force kill all processes and restart server
